summary: Adding a [i]little[/i] Miracle Grow to Skyrim's blank fields.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][size=6][color=#000000]****UPDATE REGARDING SPECIAL EDITION 12/3/16****[/color] 
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5]Il be honest, I never intended for this mod to get 50k downloads on both the workshop and the Nexus. I completely forgot about it for a while and abandoned the project which I sincerely apologize although it should go without saying I made this mod in my freshman year of highschool. So with the recent release of Skyrim Special Edition I have decided to finally finsih this mod. Now im not saying it will be complete in the next few weeks, as of right now it could be a couple of months. Im going to need to make some upgrades to my computer before i can start again and that takes sometime. I just wanted to give a heads up to the community and thank you for all the downloads. 

[/size][/color][size=5]Feel free to download this version at this time but be aware that I will no longer be supporting it. The special edition version will only be uploaded when it is 100% complete.[/size]

[color=#92d050]




Have you ever wanted more lush, vibrant, and overgrown fields around Skyrim? Then have I got news for you. After being disappointed with just about every other grass mod out right now, I decided to make my own. And it is now available to all of you.[/color]

[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/kQevHAd.jpg[/img][/size]
[color=#c00000][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif]This mod is not completed at the time, it is in very early stages! [/font][/color] [color=#92d050][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=4]Some locations to be added are:[/size][/font][/color]
[list]
[*][size=3][color=#92d050]All holds (and surrounding fields/farms/swamp/mountains)[/color][/size]
[*][size=3][color=#92d050]Key locations (Bandit camps, High Hrothgar, Forts)[/color][/size]
[*][size=3][color=#92d050]Villages (Riverwood for example)[/color][/size]
[/list]
[center][size=5][color=#548dd4]RECOMMENDATIONS:[/color][/size][/center][list]
[*][size=3][color=#92d050]To get the quality of my screen shots I[/color] [color=#ff0000]EXTREMELY[/color] [color=#92d050]recommend the K-ENB. Other ENB's do not give the light green grass you see in the screenshots.[/color][/size]
[*][color=#92d050][size=3]Besides the Flora Overhaul I recommend not to use any other grass mods with this one. [/size][/color][size=3][color=#c00000]IT WILL CONFLICT WITH ANOTHER GRASS MOD![/color][/size]
[/list]
[youtube]Iqcz6SHRppg[/youtube] [youtube]b00XG6bQ-YU[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/tKRIN3O.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/KWMIAM1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wwVYp8O.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/bc7RHyT.jpg[/img]
[color=#92d050][size=3]Due to limitations, the contents of this mod will be broken up into separate downloads based on location and type
(Example: Separate downloads for Solitude and Whiterun) The first download for this mod is focused on Whiterun.[/size][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/P71FC6v.jpg[/img]
[center][size=5][color=#9bbb59]Q & A[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: Why does this drop my fps dramatically?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: This mod is an fps killer, in the recommendations it says mainly for screenshots.[/color][/size][/center][center][size=5][color=#9bbb59]
[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: Why is X location not complete?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: This mod is being made as a series, different areas will come in time. The first release is Whiterun and Riverwood.[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]
[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: When will location X be released?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: Our focus is to get all the major holds then villages. The order of which they come in will depend on popularity and demand.[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]
[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: Why am I not getting the quality of your screenshots?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: If you want quality of my screenshots then make sure you are running the K-ENB and no other grass mods[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]
[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: Why can't I see the grass from a distance?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: Blame/Thank Skyrim's render limitations, it may look bad from a distance but it keeps your PC from blowing up.[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]
[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]Q: Why grass?[/color][/size][/center][center][size=3][color=#9bbb59]A: Why the hell not? Enjoy![/color][/size][/center]
[color=#ff0000][size=6]ON THE FIRST START UP MAKE SURE YOU ARE NOT AROUND WHITERUN![/size][/color]

[center][color=#ff0000][size=6]Looks best with [/size][/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30158][size=6][color=#ffff00][i]K-ENB[/i][/color][/size][/url][color=#ff0000][size=6] and [/size][/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141][size=6][color=#ffff00][i]Skyrim Floral Overhaul[/i][/color][/size][/url][/center]
author: JZE
